name: accessibilityAction(named:_:)
desc: Adds an accessibility action to the view. Actions allow assistive technologies, such as the VoiceOver, to interact with the view by invoking the action.
declaration: func accessibilityAction<S>(named name: S, _ handler: @escaping () -> Void) -> ModifiedContent<Self, AccessibilityAttachmentModifier> where S : StringProtocol
